frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering Co-located Alongside KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America
frontmatter.lead_text: This in person OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on November 10th live in Atlanta, GA and co-located with CNCF's KubeCon + CloudNativeCon NA
frontmatter.info_text: This Gathering will focus on talks from and by Cloud Native practioners with production deployments sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way. Topics covered during this Gathering include hybrid cloud infrastructure, cloud-native development, and new Emerging technology initiatives.
